text: Huxley Pig is a British stop motion-animated children's television series based on a picture book series by Rodney Pepp√©. It was narrated by Martin Jarvis. The first series aired from 4 June to 4 September 1980, and the second series aired from 18 September to 11 December 1981. Category:British children's television series
title: Huxley Pig
